entries.name: Age
entries: Viashino mature quickly, reaching adulthood in their early teens. They live violent lives and rarely die of old age, but they would rarely live past 60 anyway.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Viashino strongly tend toward chaotic alignments. They have no particular inclination toward good or evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Viashino are about as tall as humans, but they have lithe, wiry frames. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Bite
entries: Your fanged maw is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to {@damage 1d4} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Lashing Tail
entries: Your semi-prehensile tail is tipped with a bony blade. Immediately after a creature within 5 feet of you deals damage to you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to make an unarmed strike against that creature with your tail. If you hit, you deal slashing damage equal to {@damage 1d4} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Wiry Frame
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Acrobatics} or the {@skill Stealth} skill (your choice).

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.
